data.text: Great Experience , the stay was comfortable. Mr.Altaf and Ms.Soumaiya were lovely during house keeping and guest relations. The pool was good and location wise also it‚Äôs quite good , near to mall of the emirates and easy access to Mashreq Metro is also quite easy around 300 Meters walk
data.title: Amazing hospitality

data.text: The staff are amazing. Nhamo was able to clarify our room package inclusive. Room was great very spacious and well maintained. A little bit disappointed when they gave us a room without bathtub. But overall definitely a place I will go back for.
data.title: A classy hotel that is easy on the budget

data.text: Very peaceful and quiet place, close to the metro and many shops around. Very nice and comfy room though i couldnt connect my mobile to the smart tv. Special mention to Nhamo who did my check out always smiling from the time i reached his desk for checkout, Nhamo gave me a lot of suggestions on what to do in Dubai , thanks again Nhamo and because of your hospitality i will surely come back to Time Asmaüôèüèæüôèüèæ
data.title: Perfect short stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valuable Guest , 

We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your peaceful stay with us and found our location convenient. It's wonderful to know that you found our rooms comfortable and that Nhamo provided excellent service during your checkout process, offering valuable suggestions for your time in Dubai.

We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced in connecting your mobile to the smart TV, and we'll certainly look into improving this aspect to enhance our guests' experience.

Thank you for acknowledging Nhamo's hospitality, and we're thrilled to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Time Asma in the future. Should you need any assistance or have further suggestions, please don't hesitate to reach out. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit. 

Best Regards , 
Norena Lising 
Duty Manager
owner_response.author: Sincy Joseph

data.text:
The hotel is super clean and accommodating with very large rooms.
Excellent customer service and very helpful. 
I was checked in by Nhamo and the process was very smooth and standards were exceptional! He managed to arrange for an early breakfast as I checked in quite late (very early hours of the morning) .

Good and well looked after facilities which included gym, roof pool and spa.
data.title: Highly recommend!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valuable Guest , 

Thank you sincerely for recommending our hotel and for sharing your positive experience with us. We're thrilled to hear that you found our facilities to be clean and accommodating, with spacious rooms that met your expectations.

It's wonderful to know that you received excellent customer service during your stay, particularly during check-in with Nhamo. We're delighted that he was able to ensure a smooth process for you and arrange an early breakfast despite your late check-in.

We take pride in maintaining high standards across all aspects of our hotel, including our facilities such as the gym, roof pool, and spa. Your recognition of our efforts is truly appreciated.

Thank you once again for your kind words and for choosing to stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future for another exceptional experience at our hotel."

Best Regards , 

Norena Lising 
Duty Manager
owner_response.author: Sincy Joseph

data.text: Rooms are comfortable, spacious and great for a longer stay. Pool area is great and gym big. The floor supervisor Mr Altaf and the room attendant Muhammad delivered excellent service and was very accommodating. Highly recommended. Room service is available around the clock. About 10 min to mall.
data.title: Highly recommended big rooms

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valuable Guest, 

Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and found our rooms comfortable, spacious, and suitable for longer stays. It's fantastic to know that you appreciated our pool area and spacious gym facilities.

We'll be sure to pass along your compliments to Mr. Altaf, the floor supervisor, and Muhammad, the room attendant. They will be thrilled to hear that their service made a positive impact on your experience.

Thank you for recommending us! We're pleased to offer 24-hour room service for your convenience, and we're glad our location provides easy access to the mall, just a short 10-minute drive away.

We appreciate your support and hope to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay in the future. If there's anything else we can assist you with, please feel free to let us know.

Best Regards ,
Norena Lising
Duty Manager
owner_response.author: Sincy Joseph
